Description: Up for sale is a used BC Rich Villain Escape guitar in good condition overall. It is used with wear and scratches. The majority of issues are on the back of the body (pictured).The gloss black finish shows everything and is tough to keep pristine.. The guitar is all original, no modifications or repairs. It plays great with no playability issues or fret buzz. It has a straight neck and low action. The electronics are quiet, no unwanted hum or static. Comes with a padded gigbag.
